name: Len R's Old Rounded Dialogs/Textboxes FF3
description:
See re-make at http://userstyles.org/styles/6601

Please support me if you enjoy this; thank you to everyone who has already! I also appreciate reviews if you enjoy this theme.

Designed for Vista at 120dpi; no guarantees on 72dpi systems. I've made a few changes to try to help, but there are a few glitches I can't seem to iron out, due to how FFX is setup.
additional_info:
v4.0b6
I've integrated parts my vista statusbar and findbar theming upon (many) requests; easy to comment out if you don't like them.

rounded text fields, menulists and more in Firefox 3
includes every UI element I could find, including in several extensions. Let me know if you find more.

for matching boxes on many sites such as google, ebay, yahoo, amazon and many, many more, see my matching theme:
http://userstyles.org/styles/6294

PLEASE post any glitches you find, so I can continue to improve this. I've done some (fairly tricky) workarounds for some, for example:
 - dialogs that only have 2 skinnable parts (such as bookmark properties info)
 - number-boxes (thanks Recall for info; this has been fixed -  on vista 120dpi at least)

***Maddox: I was able to partially replicate your bugs with the numberboxes, but not fully; I can't replicate your searchbar error at all. Either they are a DE thing, an XP thing, or something unique on your machine. 

For those of you who have problems, _please_ contact me using the "Ask a question or make a suggestion" so that I can reply; it is much more helpful if you post bugs in the _bugs_ section rather than the _reviews_ section.
